name: Bloody Arcade
description:
Bloody Arcade is a 2D FPS game, with related missions. You will play Alex, an Apocalyptic warrior who has to survive to endless waves of Zombies. During this aventure, you will have many ennemies to kill with an advanced arsenal provided, in order to reach the last final boss 

Fortunately, you will be able to breath during a mini game, for example when a ghoul will ask you to fight in the ring . Are you ready to fight once for all ?

Character : 

Alex is a semi professional MMA fighter and baseball fan  living in Paris, with as you can see a badass character. She woke up one morning, and find Paris under an absolute Chaos : Cars accidents, no souls living… or almost …. 

She barely has the time to realize that a zombie apocalypse  just took place, that first waves of zombies are coming right in front of her. To survive she has to hold her position and use her handguns : baseball bat, studded bat and find more effective ones

GAMEPLAY : 

Touch to shoot : 

  • Left Screen : switch your weapons 
  • Right Screen : move your weapon 
  • Bottom of the left screen : Reload and switch weapons
  • Secret level : Boxing ring
